meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jovial.
meanings.sent1: Her constant jovialities brought smiles to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with laughter and jovialities.
meanings.sent3: His jovialities at work always lightened the mood during stressful times.
meanings.sent4: The jovialities of the holiday season warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The children's jovialities were contagious, spreading joy to all.
